word_group.brief_definition: 海军将官；游艇俱乐部主任

bilingual.source: During World War II, Winton served as an officer in Britain's Royal Air Force.
bilingual.target: 在第二次世界大战期间，温顿在英国皇家空军担任军官。
这位军官正在指挥士兵。

bilingual.source: He dreams of becoming a navy officer.
bilingual.target: 他梦想成为一名海军军官。

bilingual.source: He dreams of becoming an army officer.
bilingual.target: 他梦想成为一名陆军军官。

bilingual.source: The officer returned the salute with a nod.
bilingual.target: 军官点头回了一个敬礼。

bilingual.source: This officer has many years of experience.
bilingual.target: 这位军官有很多年的经验。

bilingual.source: He played the role of a Nazi officer.
bilingual.target: 他扮演了一名纳粹军官的角色。

bilingual.source: The officer's saber was a symbol of his rank.
bilingual.target: 军官的军刀是他军衔的象征。

bilingual.source: The cadet saluted the officer as he walked by.
bilingual.target: 军校学员在军官走过时敬礼。

yingyinNormal.en: Who? This Officer Deckard. She's trying to provoke him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喜欢谁? 喜欢这个叫狄卡的军官。她这是在激怒他呢。

yingyinNormal.en: So before you was a tailor, was you in the army? Like an officer?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你做裁缝之前，参过军吗？像军官那种？

yingyinNormal.en: You have an order in your left pocket that says that I'm a deserter impersonating an officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的左侧口袋里有一封传令说我是个逃兵，因为冒充军官被抓。

yingyinNormal.en: Me too. Oh. Did you ever see An Officer and a Gentleman? Yeah. Well, he's kinda like the guy I went to see that with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也这么想，你们看过《军官与绅士》吗？跟我一起去看这部片子的男友和他是一个类型。

yingyinNormal.en: And I forbid you to forbid her! Who are you to stop an officer of the king? Are you an empress? A saint? A deity?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不允许你禁止她做什么！你凭什么来阻止国王的军官做事？你是皇后吗？还是圣徒？还是天神？

yingyinNormal.en: Officer Hopps, could it happen again?
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍普斯警官，怎么会出现这样的事呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Officer? Hopps. Mr..? Wilde. Nick Wilde.
yingyinNormal.zh: 警官你叫？霍普斯，你是？王尔德，尼克·王尔德。

yingyinNormal.en: It's illegal to use real memories, officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 警官，给复制人注入真实的记忆是非法的。

yingyinNormal.en: Officer on deck. At ease. Welcome to Dragon Army.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长官来了。稍息，欢迎来到飞龙战队。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention! Officer on deck! Hey, Bean. Ho, Commander!
yingyinNormal.zh: 立正，长官巡视甲板。嘿，小豆子。你好，指挥官。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, I'm an officer. Just have a quick question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实我是警员就问一下。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi! Hello! It's me again! Hey! It's Officer Toot-Toot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好！又是我！是嘟嘟警官啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Permission to reinstate Mr. Spock as my First Officer. Granted.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请您恢复史波克先生的职位，继续做我的大副。批准。

yingyinNormal.en: And finally, our first bunny, Officer Hopps. Parking duty. Dismissed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后，第一只兔子，霍普斯警官，交通协管，解散。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes, and you're listed as Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer and Chief Operating Officer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，同时你被列为了首席执行官，首席财务官和首席运营官。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Officer Hopps. Let's see those teeth! Officer Hopps, look here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，霍普斯警官，笑一个！霍普斯警官，看这里。

yingyinNormal.en: Officer Hopps. It's time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 霍普斯警官，时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: So now, I'll turn things over to the officer who cracked the case. Officer Judy Hopps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来，有请解决了本案件的警官，朱迪·霍普斯警官。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, officer, was I going a little too fast? Oh my God.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨，警官，我的速度有点快吗？哦，我的天啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Officer Hopps. You ready to make the world a better place?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是霍普斯警官，准备好让世界更美好了吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: There may have been many spies and intelligence <highlight>officers</highlight> during the Napoleonic Wars, but it is usually extremely difficult to find the material.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在拿破仑战争期间，可能有很多间谍和情报官员，但通常很难找到资料。

examination_example.sentence: Brendon Lynch, Microsoft's chief privacy <highlight>officer</highlight>, blogged: "We believe consumers should have more control."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 微软首席隐私官布兰登·林奇(Brendon Lynch)在博客中写道：“我们认为消费者应该拥有更多的控制权。”

examination_example.sentence: That's because Congress has always envisioned joint federal-state immigration enforcement and explicitly encourages state <highlight>officers</highlight> to share information and cooperate with federal colleagues.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是因为，国会一直希望联邦政府和州政府联合执行移民法律，并明确鼓励州政府官员与联邦政府的同僚们共享信息并开展合作。

examination_example.sentence: He could not analyze carefully what this obscure <highlight>officer</highlight> may or may not have contributed to that great struggle between nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他无法精细分析这位鲜为人知的军官是否对那场国家间的大规模战争起到作用。

examination_example.sentence: Many documents in code that had been revealed by the work of one George Scovell, an <highlight>officer</highlight> in British headquarters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多密码文件已经被英军指挥部的一位军官乔治•斯科维尔揭露了出来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
